kind: struct

Test Unmarshal into slice of string, int, bool, time.Duration, and time.Time.

>>>
[slice]
string = string 0
int = 1
int = 2
bool = true
duration = 1s
time = 2021-02-28 03:56:01

[slice]
string = string 1
string = string 2
int = 3
bool = false
duration = 2s
time = 2021-02-28 03:56:02

<<<
[section]
time = 0001-01-01 00:00:00
string =
duration = 0s
int = 0
bool = false

[section "struct"]
string =
int = 0

[slice]
bool = true
bool = false
duration = 1s
duration = 2s
int = 1
int = 2
int = 3
string = string 0
string = string 1
string = string 2
time = 2021-02-28 03:56:01
time = 2021-02-28 03:56:02
